solution_line_template: On day one Conner collects {conner_day1} rocks because {conner_day1_multiplier} x {sydney_day1} = <<{conner_day1_multiplier}*{sydney_day1}={conner_day1}>>{conner_day1}
On day three Sydney collects {sydney_day3} because {conner_day1} x {sydney_day3_multiplier} = <<{conner_day1}*{sydney_day3_multiplier}={sydney_day3}>>{sydney_day3}

After three days Sydney has {sydney_total} rocks because {sydney_start} + {sydney_day2} + {sydney_day1} + {sydney_day3} =<<{sydney_start}+{sydney_day2}+{sydney_day1}+{sydney_day3}={sydney_total}>>{sydney_total}
Before the third day Conner has {conner_before_day3} because {conner_start} + {conner_day1} + {conner_day2} = <<{conner_start}+{conner_day1}+{conner_day2}={conner_before_day3}>>{conner_before_day3}
Conner needs to collect {conner_needed_day3} on day three to tie Sydney because {sydney_total} - {conner_before_day3} = {conner_needed_day3}
